boilerplate.components.Footer.author.mes: Made with love by Fortune Vieyra.
boilerplate.components.Footer.license.me: This is a react coding exercise for MeltWater
boilerplate.containers.RedactPage.css.me: Redact any text in double quotes.
boilerplate.containers.RedactPage.feedba:
Enjoy the best DX and code your app at the speed of thought! Your
    saved changes to the CSS and JS are reflected instantaneously
    without refreshing the page. Preserve application state even when
    you update something in the underlying code!
boilerplate.containers.RedactPage.intern: Scalable apps need to support multiple languages, easily add and support multiple languages with `react-intl`.
boilerplate.containers.RedactPage.javasc:
Use template strings, object destructuring, arrow functions, JSX
    syntax and more, today.
boilerplate.containers.RedactPage.networ:
The next frontier in performant web apps: availability without a
      network connection from the instant your users load the app.
boilerplate.containers.RedactPage.routin:
Write composable CSS that's co-located with your components for
    complete modularity. Unique generated class names keep the
    specificity low while eliminating style clashes. Ship only the
    styles that are on the page for the best performance.
boilerplate.containers.RedactPage.scaffo: Type in a text and anything that's within double quotes will be redacted.
boilerplate.containers.RedactPage.state_:
Unidirectional data flow allows for change logging and time travel
    debugging.
boilerplate.containers.HomePage.start_pr: This text censor will remove any key words, and replace them with 'X's. To begin, input text into box press 'Censor Text', and your censored text is ready to go!
boilerplate.containers.HomePage.tryme.me: Type your text and wrap your secret message in "double quotes" to redact.
boilerplate.containers.NotFoundPage.head: Page not found.
